heroBanner.title:
<0>STILL IELTS BUT
IN AN <1>INTERESTING WAY
heroBanner.description: Our innovative IELTS learning platform combines the power of gamification with personalized study plans, making IELTS preparation fun and effective. Start your journey to conquer IELTS today!

gamificationInfo.name: 5-minute daily lesson system
gamificationInfo.description: Just 5 minutes a day to learn a concise but effective lesson, helping you maintain the habit and improve your IELTS skills.

gamificationInfo.name: Level up with accumulated experience points
gamificationInfo.description: Study hard to accumulate experience points, upgrade your personal level, and unlock attractive rewards.

gamificationInfo.name: Exchange items for power and free grading turns
gamificationInfo.description: Collect and exchange items to gain more power, unlock special privileges, and get free grading turns every day.

mobileApp.title: LEARN ANYTIME, ANYWHERE WITH THE MOBILE VERSION
mobileApp.description: No matter where you are, LapinLearn can accompany you. With just 5 minutes a day, you can still hone your IELTS skills.

aiAssistant.title: LEARN WITH AI ASSISTANT
description: Detailed feedback on Writing and Speaking tests, including specific criteria assessments and estimated band scores.
More proactive and flexible time management.
